title: Mr.Robot
description: Mr. Robot follows Elliot, a young programmer who works as a cyber-security engineer by day and as a vigilante hacker by night.
author: Filip Jerga
wsl: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday, Christian Slater

title: The Office
description: A motley group of office workers go through hilarious misadventures at the Scranton, Pennsylvania, branch of the Dunder Mifflin Paper Company.
author: Filip Jerga
wsl: Steve Carell, John Krasinski, Rainn Wilson, B.J. Novak

type: Thriller, Drama, Science fiction, Mystery, Supernatural
title: Dark
description: When two children go missing in a small German town, its sinful past is exposed along with the double lives and fractured relationships that exist among four families as they search for the kids.
author: Filip Jerga
wsl: Louis Hoffman, Lisa Vicari, Oliver Masucci, Maja Schone

type: Drama, Crime film, Thriller, Comedy Drama
title: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind who goes by The Professor has a plan to pull off the biggest heist in recorded history -- to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain. To help him carry out the ambitious plan, he recruits eight people with certain abilities and who have nothing to lose. The group of thieves take hostages to aid in their negotiations with the authorities, who strategize to come up with a way to capture The Professor. As more time elapses, the robbers prepare for a showdown with the police.
author: Filip Jerga
wsl: Alvaro Morte, Pedro Alonso, Ursula Corbero, Jaime Lorente
Drama, Crime film, Thriller, Comedy Drama

type: Dark Comedy, Drama, Suspense, Crime film
title: Breaking Bad
description: Walter White, a chemistry teacher, discovers that he has cancer and decides to get into the meth-making business to repay his medical debts. His priorities begin to change when he partners with Jesse.
author: Filip Jerga
wsl: Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Anna Gunn, Krysten Ritter
Dark Comedy, Drama, Suspense, Crime film

title: The Big Bang Theory
description: The lives of four socially awkward friends, Leonard, Sheldon, Howard and Raj, take a wild turn when they meet the beautiful and free-spirited Penny.
author: Filip Jerga
wsl: Kaley Cuoco, Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki, Simon Helberg

title: Game of Thrones
description: Nine noble families wage war against each other in order to gain control over the mythical land of Westeros. Meanwhile, a force is rising after millenniums and threatens the existence of living men.
author: Filip Jerga
wsl: Emilia Clarke, Maisie Williams, Kit Harrington, Sophie Turner

title: Friends
description: Follow the lives of six reckless adults living in Manhattan, as they indulge in adventures which make their lives both troublesome and happening.
author: Filip Jerga
wsl: Mathew Perry, David Schwimmer, Courtney Cox, Jennifer Aniston

title: Narcos
description: Netflix chronicles the rise of the cocaine trade in Colombia and the gripping real-life stories of drug kingpins of the late '80s in this raw, gritty original series. Also detailed are the actions taken by law enforcement as they battle in the war on drugs, targeting notorious and powerful figures that include drug lord Pablo Escobar. As efforts are made to control cocaine, one of the world's most valuable commodities, the many entities involved -- legal, political, police, military and civilian -- find themselves in conflict.
author: Filip Jerga
wsl: Wagner Moura, Pedro Pascal, Boyd Holbrook, Jose Maria Yazpik

type: Dark Comedy, Sitcom, Adventure fiction, Animated sitcom
title: Rick and Morty
description: Rick, an alcoholic sociopath and scientist, lives with his daughter Beth's family. Apart from building gadgets, he takes his morally right but dimwit grandson Morty on absurd intergalactic adventures.
author: Filip Jerga
wsl: Justin Roiland, Dan Harmon, Spencer Grammer, Chris Parnell
Dark Comedy, Sitcom, Adventure fiction, Animated sitcom
